name: Kyogre
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: It is said to have widened the seas by causing downpours. It had been asleep in a marine trench.

attacks.name: Wave Summoning
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a {W} Energy card and attach it to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Dynamic Wave
attacks.effect: Put 3 Energy attached to this Pokémon into your hand. This attack does 180 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
